tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE virtual_medical_examinations (
  appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  doctor_id UUID,
  appointment_date TIMESTAMP,
  health_concerns TEXT,
  video_link TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  doctor_id INT,
  appointment_date DATETIME,
  consultation_notes TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE Patient (   patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,   name VARCHAR(255),   age INT,   gender VARCHAR(10),   medical_history TEXT );
CREATE TABLE Doctor (   doctor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,   name VARCHAR(255),   specialty VARCHAR(100),   years_of_experience INT,   license_number VARCHAR(20) );
CREATE TABLE Appointment (   appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,   patient_id UUID,   doctor_id UUID,   appointment_date TIMESTAMP,   status VARCHAR(20) );
CREATE TABLE Consultation (   consultation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,   appointment_id UUID,   consultation_date TIMESTAMP,   diagnosis TEXT,   prescription TEXT );

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  doctor_id UUID REFERENCES doctors(doctor_id),
  appointment_date TIMESTAMP,
  status STRING
);

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
  prescription_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  doctor_id UUID REFERENCES doctors(doctor_id),
  prescription_text TEXT,
  date_prescribed DATE
);
